dict.acceptation: 签名；署名；识别标志，鲜明特征；[医]药的用法说明；

sent.orig: The electronic handwritten signature verification technology includes a signature gathering system, and a signature verification system.
sent.trans: 电子手写签名认证技术包括签名采集系统和签名认证系统。

sent.orig: Threshold signature is a special digital signature,and it is in popular use.
sent.trans: 门限签名是一种特殊的数字签名，它在现实生活中具有广泛的用途。

sent.orig: Signature should correspond to specimen signature on record for the Designated Account.
sent.trans: 签署必须与指定账户签署式样相同。

sent.orig: If the file already has a digital signature, it will be overwritten by the new signature.
sent.trans: 如果文件已有数字签名，则会被新的签名改写。

sent.orig: This signature should correspond with the specimen signature of card application form.
sent.trans: 必须与信用卡申请表上之印鉴签署相同。
